title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy AI Agents with Confidence & Control with Rubrik and AWS (ISV320)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Rubrik 和 AWS 自信且可控地部署 AI 代理 (ISV320)
abstract: AI agents are powerful but risky. They can access sensitive data, trigger workflows, and make autonomous decisions. Rubrik and AWS are helping enterprises adopt agents with confidence through AI Resilience, the enterprise platform for agent operations. Rubrik AI Resilience powered by Predibase unifies observability, governance, and recoverability across every agent. Compatible with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and related services, the platform enables organizations to monitor agent actions, detect risks in real time, and remediate destructive behavior with safe rollback. Join Rubrik GM of AI Dev Rishi and an AWS co-speaker to explore how to make agentic AI secure, trustworthy, and resilient.
abstract_cn: AI 代理功能强大但存在风险。它们可以访问敏感数据、触发工作流程并做出自主决策。Rubrik 和 AWS 正在通过 AI Resilience（企业级代理运营平台）帮助企业自信地采用代理。由 Predibase 提供支持的 Rubrik AI Resilience 统一了每个代理的可观测性、治理和可恢复性。该平台与 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 及相关服务兼容，使组织能够监控代理操作、实时检测风险，并通过安全回滚修复破坏性行为。欢迎加入 Rubrik AI 开发总经理 Rishi 和 AWS 联合演讲者，探讨如何使代理式 AI 变得安全、可信且具有韧性。
